Package emissary.pickup

Class WorkBundle

java.lang.Object
emissary.pickup.WorkBundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<WorkBundle>
public final class WorkBundle extends Object implements Comparable<WorkBundle>
Used to communicate between the TreePickUpPlace and TreeSpace about a set of files to process.

Two times are tracked for the files in each work bundle - the "youngest" modification time and the "oldest" modification time, both initially entered as time from the epoch. However, the concept of "youngest" and "oldest" is relative to the construction time, so that:

getOldestFileModificationTime() <= getYoungestFileModificationTime()

      Parameters:
      that - the work bundle to copy

      public int addWorkUnit(WorkUnit workUnit)
      Add a workUnit to the list.
      Parameters:
      workUnit - the workUnit to add
      Returns:
      number of WorkUnits in list after add
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if adding the unit would cause the bundle to contain more than MAX_UNITS work units

    • addWorkUnit

      public int addWorkUnit(WorkUnit workUnit, long fileModificationTimeInMillis, long fileSize)
      Add a workunit to the list
      Parameters:
      workUnit - the workUnit to add
      fileModificationTimeInMillis - the file modification time in milliseconds since epoch
      fileSize - the size of the file added.
      Returns:
      number of files in this set after update
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if adding the unit would cause the bundle to contain more than MAX_UNITS work units

    • addWorkUnits

      protected int addWorkUnits(List<WorkUnit> list)
      Add from a list, without adjusting file modification time tracking.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the total size of WorkUnits in this bundle
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if adding the units would cause the bundle to contain more than MAX_UNITS work units
